attributes.action: High achievers: let grade 9 mocks count as real GCSE results
attributes.background: Allow students who achieve a grade 9 in their official GCSE mock exams to have it count as their final GCSE, so they don’t need to retake the subject in summer. This would reward top performers, reduce stress, and free time for further study or enrichment.

rejection.details: Decisions about this are a matter for exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.
